meanings.definition: A member of a Mexican-American youth subculture in the 1940s, characterized by zoot suits and a rebellious attitude.
meanings.sent1: The pachucos in the neighborhood always wore stylish zoot suits.
meanings.sent2: Many pachucos enjoyed dancing to swing music in the clubs.
meanings.sent3: The pachucos decided to start a zoot suit fashion show for fun.
meanings.sent4: His confidence on the dance floor made him stand out like a pachucos in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The pachucos' bold fashion choices made them unforgettable in the city.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of pachucos walking down the street.
meanings.sent2: The pachucos gathered at the park for a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The pachucos' laughter echoed through the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The colorful outfits of the pachucos brightened up the party.
meanings.sent5: The pachucos' unity was evident in their shared traditions.
